name: Tizeti
headline: ISP for Africa
description: Tizeti provides broadband internet services to densely populated urban centers in Africa. Tizeti is leveraging the large wireless capacity available with Wi-Fi and plummeting cost of solar panels to create a low CAPEX/OPEX network of owned and operated towers to offer disruptive, customer-friendly pricing for unlimited internet service right across Africa.

founders.name: Ifeanyi Okonkwo, Founder/Co  & Chief Operating Officer
founders.description:
Co-founder and Chief Operating Officer for Tizeti Inc has  over 17 years experience in the telecommunication industry.
Prior to Tizeti, he worked with Blackberry (Research in  Motion) part of the team that started Blackberry in Nigerian and expansion to Ghana. He also worked at Eircom Ireland.
He has a B.Sc from University of Benin, Benin City,Nigeria  and an M.Sc from the University of  Salford UK. Currently focused on expansion to Francophone Africa

# Home
## Fast Wifi Technology
In Africa, despite its slow start and almost nonexistent infrastructure Tizeti is building Wi-Fi solar base stations to provide affordable Unlimited internet service across Africa.
## Solar Powered Base Station
Tizeti is leveraging the plummeting cost of Solar Panels and its low operating expense to power its base station and pass the savings to its customers to provide internet that transforms every aspect of their daily lives as well as drive innovation in the region.
## Connecting Africa
Network with businesses and global partners across in real time. Enjoy our services at various locations throughout Africa.
## Shaping the Future
The possibilities are endless with the right technology. Invest in the next generation, Invest in tomorrow.
## ConnectingFamilies
Nothing should stop you from spending time with your family. With Tizeti, stay connected anywhere, anytime.
#### [Previous](http://www.tizeti.com/<#>)#### [Next](http://www.tizeti.com/<#>)
### What we do
#### ![](http://demo.cregital.com/tizeti/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/Sloar-Panel-300x300.png)
#### Solar Powered Base Station
Tizeti is leveraging the large wireless capacity available with Wi-fi and plummeting cost of solar panels to create a low CAPEX/OPEX network of owned & operated towers to offer disruptive, customer-friendly pricing for unlimited internet service right across Africa. 
#### ![](https://www.tizeti.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/Wifi-150x150.png)
#### Unlimited Wifi Internet
Tizeti provides high speed broadband internet to Residences, businesses, Events, Conferences and deploys public Wi-fi Hotspot at locations across Africa. 
### Our Team

#### Amanosi Okhakhu
###### CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER

### Kendall Ananyi
  * Masters in Computer Engineering University of Victoria,Canada.
  * Over 19 years experience in Telecommunication and Software
  * Worked in Various Companies
  * ExxonMobil
  * Microsoft Canada
  * PricewaterhouseCoopers
  * In-depth wireless networking knowledge, project management and software experience


### Ifeanyi Okonkwo
  * Masters In Quality Management, University of Salford, UK 
  * Over 15 years experience within in Telecommunication 
  * Worked with various companies
  * BlackBerry formerly Research In Motion
  * Eircom Telecommunication (Ireland)
  * In-depth Customer Relationship Management and Operations management knowledge and experience


### Ikenna Uche
  * Over 19 years experience within in Telecommunication 
  * Worked with various companies
  * Mobax (Subsidiary of Vodacom
  * Zoom Mobile
  * He is a seasoned and experienced telecommunications professional with vast networking experience, excellent technical project management skills


### Amanosi Okhakhu
  * She is a seasoned finance professional with experience in diverse industries such as telecommunication, oil and gas, power and the hospitality sector. 
  * She has led the provision of professional services to small, medium, large and complex organizations in Nigeria and UK. 
  * Prior to joining Tizeti, she was a Senior Manager in PwC with 10 years professional accounting experience. She is a member of the Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria (ICAN).

generated_description:
### Tizeti: Bridging Africa with Affordable Internet

**Overview**  
Tizeti is an innovative Internet Service Provider (ISP) located in Lagos, Nigeria, on a mission to transform internet access across Africa. Founded as part of Y Combinator's W17 batch, Tizeti focuses on delivering broadband internet services primarily to densely populated urban areas. Imagine a world where high-speed internet is not a luxury, but a standard—Tizeti aims to make that a reality.

**How They Do It**  
Tizeti stands out by harnessing the power of solar energy and Wi-Fi technology. By establishing a network of solar-powered base stations, they leverage cost-effective solar panels to minimize operational expenses. This approach allows them to offer unlimited internet access at surprisingly low prices—a genuine disruption in the traditional ISP landscape.

**Services Offered**  
- **Unlimited Wi-Fi Internet**: From residences to businesses, Tizeti provides high-speed broadband and deploys public hotspots across various locations in Africa.
- **WIFI.COM.NG**: Their flagship internet service brand tailored for residential needs.
- **GhanaWiFi**: A service expansion catering specifically to the Ghanaian market.
- **Hotspot Wi-Fi**: In strategic locations, Tizeti is deploying community Wi-Fi solutions.

**Why It Matters**  
Access to the internet is a game-changer, particularly in Africa, where traditional infrastructure has lagged behind. Tizeti's unique model not only connects families and businesses but also empowers innovation and drives socioeconomic development in the region. They recognize that every click can lead to new opportunities, and they’re committed to making those connections happen.

**The Team**  
The leadership team is packed with telecom veterans with extensive experience in companies like ExxonMobil, Microsoft, and PwC. This blend of knowledge and ambition helps Tizeti navigate the complexities of the African telecom sector.

- **Kendall Ananyi** (CEO): With a Master's in Computer Engineering, Kendall brings over 19 years of expertise to the table.
- **Ifeanyi Okonkwo** (COO): A master in Quality Management, Ifeanyi has vast telecommunications experience.
- **Ikenna Uche** (CTO): With years in tech management and networking, Ikenna is a crucial figure in driving Tizeti's technology forward.
- **Amanosi Okhakhu** (CFO): A seasoned finance expert, Amanosi ensures the company's fiscal health while navigating diverse sectors.

**Investors**  
Tizeti has attracted attention from notable investors, including Y Combinator, which signifies the potential impact and scalability of their business model.

**Contact and Future Endeavors**  
Tizeti encourages inquiries via multiple channels and is always on the lookout for new opportunities to expand its footprint across Africa. Their vision is clear: By connecting more people with reliable internet, they are not just shaping the present but are also paving the way for the future.

If you're curious to know more or get involved, check them out at [Tizeti](http://www.tizeti.com).

In a nutshell, Tizeti isn't just about providing internet; they're about creating a connected Africa, where everyone has the opportunity to thrive in the digital age.
